item.title: PLTR
item.description: score:180 Chances: Palantir has been a popular growth stock for investors bullish on artificial intelligence. Shares of Palantir (PLTR) are moving up as the company announced it won a contract with the US Army valued at $178 million, to build out TITAN (Tactical Intelligence Targeting Access Node) artificial intelligence-enabled ground stations.
